description: This file contains implementation for the creation, initialization, and removal of a BSP template variable object, including functions to handle variable operations such as increase, decrease, arithmetic operations, and content management, specifically for the BSP engine variable component.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BspTemplateVarCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a BSP template variable object, setting up essential function pointers and context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BspTemplateVarCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the BSP template variable object, freeing allocated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BspTemplateVarCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the variable object with function pointers for variable operations and sets default values.
